definitions.definition: The anniversary of the day on which someone is born.
examples: When's your birthday ? Mine's on April 1.
I'll be thirty-seven (years old) next birthday .

definitions.definition: The anniversary of the day on which something is created.
The date on which someone is born or something is created, more commonly called birthdate or date of birth .

examples: I'd like to invite you all to my birthday .

main_definition: The anniversary of the day on which someone is born. [From 1570s]
secondary_definitions: The anniversary of the day on which something is created.
The date on which someone is born or something is created, more commonly called birthdate or date of birth .
